alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued December 25 at 11:20AM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations of one quarter to one half of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Nelson, Grand Forks, Griggs, Steele and Traill Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Steele; Traill
